name: In The Circus We Laugh
description:
Over the past few weeks, disappearances of guests have been plaguing the carnival. They seem to simply vanish, oftentimes when they are alone. Family to the disappeared ones have been begging for their finding, the one responsible and some even petitioning for the carnival to shut down. Rumors are spreading and many people have started being suspicious in the public eye. Anonymous tips have narrowed down the search to Stitches the Clown, Louis the Strongman, and Vega the Lion Tamer.

This is a school project made in Twine2 using Harlowe. This was made to meet a deadline, so there are a lot of rough edges and bad writing, plus some slightly unfinished endings.  Enjoy it for what it is :)
